titles.title: A bill to authorize a certificate of documentation for the vessel SERENA.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9990)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings under the authority of the order of Aug 2, 93 without amendment. With written report No. 103-133.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 190.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/30/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
